## TV 

[Happy people](happy_people.html)

Great documentary made by Werner Herzog. Werner took existing footage from a Russian documentary and created a masterpiece. The best thing is that you can listen to the soundtrack for free. Great music to listen while working.


[Detectorists](http://www.imdb.com/title/tt4082744/)

This little show is a treasure. Created and directer by Mackenzie Crook.
